{{also|刘皇叔}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=刘皇叔|type=12}}

===Etymology===
[[劉]] ([[w:Liu Bei|Liu Bei]]'s [[surname]]) + [[皇叔]] (the uncle of an emperor)
: In [[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]], [[w:Liu Bei|Liu Bei]]'s family connections to the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]] were greatly exaggerated, which led to the coining of this moniker for him.
